function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper disposal and treatment of wastewater from people infected with COVID-19 affecting water, soil, environment, and living organisms","Impact":"Deadly effects on living organisms, exacerbation of global warming, and transmission of infectious particles","Mitigation":"Proper treatment and disposal of wastewater, implementation of advanced sanitation processes","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems, disinfection technologies, and sewage monitoring tools","People":"Living organisms, sanitation workers, environmental professionals","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facilities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Presence of coronavirus genetic material in wastewater with increasing prevalence of COVID-19 infection","Impact":"Potential transmission of infectious particles, especially to sanitation workers","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation processes, advanced wastewater testing, and monitoring","Technologies":"Wastewater testing technologies, genetic material detection systems","People":"Sanitation workers, wastewater treatment facilities","Owner":"Health organizations, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Fecal-oral transmission of infectious diseases through wastewater","Impact":"Spread of infectious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improved sanitation and waste management practices, public awareness and education","Technologies":"Advanced sanitation systems, sewage monitoring tools","People":"General public, sanitation workers","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"}]}
